author: Chris Reed
description: Best Buy has already pushed its Memorial Day sale 2025 live. You can save on Apple products, major appliances, lawn tools, TVs, and much more.
title: The Best Buy Memorial Day Sale Is Now Live With Fresh New Tech Deals

author: Eric Song
description: These are Alienware's new flagship gaming laptops for 2025.
title: The Alienware Area-51 RTX 5080 Gaming Laptop Drops to Under $3,000 for the First Time

author: Kevin Lee
description: Looking for an affordable computer screen? We've picked out the best budget monitors including ultrawide, 4K, and portable options.
title: Best Budget Monitors 2025: Top Cheap Computer Screens

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is celebrating its 10th anniversary in 2025, and developer CD Projekt is already giving fans a taste of the concerts, merch, and more it has in store.
title: CD Projekt Kicks Off The Witcher 3 10th Anniversary With Celebratory Streams Ahead of Concert Tour

author: Vikki Blake
description: Final Fantasy 11 producer and director Yoji Fujito has revealed that had it not been for a resurgence of players around the game's 20th anniversary in 2022, there was a "real possibility" support for the MMORPG would've come to an end.
title: Final Fantasy 11 Director Says Your Support Convinced Square Enix It 'Should Keep Running the Game'

author: Michael Peyton
description: ID@Xbox is headed to IGN Live June 7-8 with 10 playable games and a special panel focusing on the state of indie gaming.
title: ID@Xbox Will Be at IGN Live With 10 Playable Games

author: Eric Song
description: A great budget card for 1080p gaming.
title: The PNY GeForce RTX 5060 Ti 16GB Graphics Card Is Available at Launch Price (No Markup)

author: Christian Wait
description: As of May 19, Zekrom EX has surged 167% to $391.97, while Salamence ex dropped 63% to $90.50. Here's a full breakdown of the biggest Pokémon card climbers and crashers this week.
title: The Biggest Pokémon Card Crashers And Climbers This Week - May 19

author: Michael Higham
description: The AutoFull M6 Ultra offers a comfortable, fully adjustable gaming chair with built-in heating, cooling, and massage at a surprisingly competitive price point.
title: The AutoFull M6 Ultra is a Premium Gaming Chair Punching Above Its Weight

author: Eric Song
description: The best TV for PlayStation 5.
title: The 65" LG Evo C4 4K OLED Smart TV Drops to the Lowest Price Ever for Memorial Day

author: Eric Song
description: This is a high-capacity, high-speed battery backup with built-in USB Type-C cable.
title: The $18 Iniu 20,000mAh 45W USB Power Bank Can Fast Charge Your Nintendo Switch, Steam Deck, or iPhone 16

author: Eric Song
description: This is the best soundbar under $200.
title: For Today Only, Save 66% Off the Bose Smart Soundbar 550 with Dolby Atmos

author: Ben Williams
description: Amazon has plenty of third-party Switch 2 accessories already available, with many at a discount. Here are the best early picks that are actually worth your money.
title: Best Switch 2 Accessory Deals: Amazon Has Some Big Discounts on Third-Party Cases and Screen Protectors

author: Tom Phillips
description: Fortnite's Star Wars season has just dropped its biggest new skin yet from a galaxy far, far away — and stunned fans by locking it behind a 1.28 million XP grind.
title: Star Wars' Darth Jar Jar Now Available in Fortnite, but Fans Can't Believe You Must Earn 1 million XP Before You Can Buy Him

author: Lex Briscuso
description: There’s no denying how exciting it is to know there’s a new Final Destination movie in theaters right now. Final Destination: Bloodlines finally brings fans the sixth part of the iconic franchise, and it simply wouldn’t be a Final Destination film without the likes of legend Tony Todd. The late actor, who is best known for his terrifying turn as the original Candyman, gave a powerful monologue in the film — and it turns out the speech was unscripted, according to producer Craig Perry, who called Todd’s one final appearance “very bittersweet.”
title: Tony Todd's Last Final Destination Speech Was an Unscripted 'Bittersweet' Message To Fans: 'Everything That Makes That Scene So Emotional Is Authentic'

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: We spoke to Honkai: Star Rail lead game designer Chengnan An in the wake of the Game Developers' Conference (GDC) 2025 to get his perspective on Honkai as a whole, Honkai: Star Rail, and where the Astral Express is headed in the coming years.
title: Honkai: Star Rail Lead Designer Says It Will Take 'Far Beyond Just a Few Years' to Realize Game's Full Potential

author: Eric Song
description: Alienware's new flagship PC is paired with Nvidia's most powerful GPU.
title: Save $600 Off the Top of the Line Alienware Area-51 GeForce RTX 5090 Prebuilt Gaming PC

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Whenever you check Steam's Global Top Sellers, you can expect a few usual suspects; the latest live-service hit, upcoming high-profile releases, or the current popular game everyone's eager to talk about. Open it up this morning, though, and you might have seen an interesting entry climbing the ranks: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time.
title: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time Is Out In Early Access and Climbing Steam's Charts — Here's Why

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: If you enjoyed 1800's gently gripping mix of city-planning, production-chain linking, and nautical exploration, Anno 117 delivers these fundamentals in an equally satisfying manner. But its later-game ideas, the military management and the concept of cultural assimilation, that will ultimately determine how well Anno 117 captures its Roman setting.
title: Anno 117: Pax Romana – Anno Finally Goes to Rome and So Far It’s Glorious

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Thankfully, the trips to Sesame Street are not over. The beloved kids television series, which has been running since 1969, will now be available to stream on Netflix and PBS after HBO and Max did not renew their longstanding deal with the series at the end of 2024.
title: Netflix Strikes Deal With Beloved Kids Show Sesame Street For New Episodes After HBO Max Partnership Ends

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has confirmed it will return to Gamescom to showcase Switch 2 this year, after skipping 2024's event. But what could it show?
title: Nintendo Announces Gamescom Return After Skipping Last Year's Event, Raising Hopes of Switch 2 Game Reveals

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Last week, WizKids' Baldur's Gate 3 miniatures arrived, and they didn't exactly garner rave reviews. The public response seems to have been heard, and now WizKids is offering refunds to anyone who feels dissatisfied with their minifig boxes.
title: WizKids Offering Refunds For Baldur's Gate 3 Minis That 'Missed the Mark'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Nintendo has announced plans to open a new official store in Fukuoka, Japan at the end of 2025. But some aren't happy with the location, namechecking the 'Nagoya Skip' trend.
title: Nintendo to Open New Official Store in Fukuoka, Japan — but Not Everyone Is Happy With This Choice

author: Chris Reed
description: Everything you need to know to preorder the limited-edition 4K steelbook version of Final Destination: Bloodlines.
title: Final Destination: Bloodlines 4K Steelbook Is Up for Preorder

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: Exploring every timeline in the Gundam series.
title: How to Watch Mobile Suit Gundam in Order

author: Ben Williams
description: Here's a new trick on how to get 13 months of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate for just £75 (equivalent to £5.76/month), and no VPN required.
title: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate: Score 13 Months For Just £75 With This New Trick

author: Lex Briscuso
description: At this point, Tom Cruise might very well live forever — and if he does, at least we know he’ll still be making movies. The legendary actor and daredevil stunt performer recently doubled down on his past declaration that he would continue to make movies into his 80s, and he even took that claim to the next level.
title: Tom Cruise Claims He's Actually Going to Make Movies 'Into His 100s,' Not Just His 80s: 'I Will Never Stop'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The rebooted DCU is in full swing, with Superman waiting to get the main event underway in July. So, can fans a Disney+-style official chronological timeline? James Gunn has responded.
title: James Gunn Offers Rebooted DCU Timeline Clarification: ‘It's Basically as the Movies and Shows Come Out’

author: Erik Adams
description: Rick and Morty season 8 gets off to a lackluster start by retreading old adventures and themes.
title: Rick and Morty Season 8 Review – Episodes 1 and 3-5

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Lego Group has forced an intrepid team of developers to shut down their impressive-looking Bionicle fan project, after eight years' work.
title: Lego Just Shut Down A Brilliant-Looking Bionicle Fan Project After 8 Years

author: Vikki Blake
description: Hideo Kojima's Metal Gear spiritual successor, Physint, is still "another five or six years" away from release. That's according to Kojima himself, who told Le Film Francais that his aspirations to direct a movie were on hold at least until he had finished developing his first "action espionage" game since he very publicly parted ways with Konami in 2015.
title: Hideo Kojima Reveals He's Ready to 'Take On' Directing a Film — but Not Until PlayStation Game Physint Is Finished, and That'll Take 'Another 5 or 6 Years'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Marvel fans have their best look yet at the MCU Galactus after a Snapple promo revealed the design of the supervillain in The Fantastic Four: First Steps.
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Leaks Continue, This Time Our Best Look Yet at Galactus Via… Snapple?

author: Matt Purslow
description: The Last of Us Season 2 recreates several scenes from the game - see how close the show's creators got to the original moments in our episode six comparison.
title: The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6: TV Show vs Game Comparison

author: Tom Phillips
description: An eye-opening leak from the set of Avengers: Doomsday has spilled the return of a major location in the Marvel universe — and with it, the likely reappearance of a character from earlier MCU films and TV series.
title: Avengers: Doomsday Set Leak Reveals Return To Surprising MCU Location, And Hints At Reappearance Of Captain America Character

author: Ben Williams
description: The new Super Mario Kart LEGO set is back in stock at Nintendo UK for £150, and available on back-order with a free gift at the LEGO store.
title: Nintendo Has Restocked the Super Mario Kart LEGO Set in the UK, Here's Where to Buy

author: Christian Wait
description: As of May 19, Magic: The Gathering Final Fantasy preorders are still live, Pokémon TCG single card prices are dropping fast, and you can score major deals on RTX 5080 gaming PCs, Pixel 9 Pro, and a limited edition DOOM art print.
title: Deals For Today: MTG FF Preorders Are Still Live and Pokémon TCG Single Cards Crash

author: Matt Purslow
description: Multiple developers from CD Projekt Red reveal how they approach choice and consequence in The Witcher and Cyberpunk 2077, from small gameplay shifts to huge branching story moments.
title: How the Creators of The Witcher and Cyberpunk 2077 Became the Masters of Choice and Consequence

author: Vikki Blake
description: As Destiny 2 developer Bungie scrambles to recover its reputation after yet another independent artist accused the studio of "lifting" their artwork in Marathon, the community around the developer is wondering what's next.
title: Fans Discuss Marathon Developer Bungie's Future After Yet Another Plagiarism Row Rocks Studio: 'Make No Mistake, This Is An Existential Struggle For Bungie At This Point'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Switch 2's GameChat includes a couple of clever features that Nintendo has so far been keeping under wraps: live subtitles and text-to-speech.
title: Switch 2 GameChat Includes 2 Big Features We’ve Not Seen Before on a Nintendo Console

author: Vikki Blake
description: After Stellar Blade's Steam rollout was mysteriously blocked in countries like Egypt, Vietnam, Estonia, and Cuba, developer Shift Up said it was "closely discussing the region locked issue" with publisher Sony.
title: Stellar Blade Devs 'Closely Discussing' Mysterious PC Region Lock Issue With Sony

title: Nvidia RTX 5060 Is Finally Here, But You Might Want to Wait

title: The Last of Us: Season 2 Episode 6 Review

description: Strap in for a ripper round of savings that’ll leave you over-encumbered in no time, like a stroll through an Oblivion market
title: AU Deals: Price Slayings on Doom Dark Ages, Oblivion Remastered, Space Marine 2, Outlaws, and More!
